ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for spamming, just kind of curious what happens if you uncheck the Wrap message text box.  The last message - see below - I hit enter at the end of
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for spamming, just kind of curious what happens if you uncheck
the "Wrap message text" box. The last message - see below - I hit
enter at the end of each line, which helped. Hm . . .
--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., jonathanv_00 <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> You know, I responded to this
> too, also mentioning Paint, but
> the message seems to have disappeard.
>

> the big freakin' ads that mess up
> the lines, etc?
>
> And the ever-popular inclusion of the
> message you're replying to . . .
